actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill entitled the "Small Business Act of 1983".

summary.text: Small Business Act of 1983 - Requires the President to submit to Congress an annual report which shall contain: (1) a description of activities performed in the previous year by the Government which could be more efficiently performed by small business and a schedule for transferring such activities to the private sector; and (2) an estimate of the potential cost savings to the Government and taxpayers of conducting such activities under contract with small business.

titles.title: A bill entitled the "Small Business Act of 1983".
